technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, mentioning missing out on seeing friends and having to be at home all the time.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation and shared her experiences, but did not go above and beyond to relate to the conversation partner.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and shared her experiences, but did not go above and beyond to relate to the conversation partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying her beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The importance of vaccines was not explicitly discussed at the end of the conversation.
booster_importance: The importance of boosters was not explicitly discussed at the end of the conversation.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a basic level of cognitive complexity by sharing her experiences and perspectives, but did not engage in deep analysis or consideration of multiple viewpoints.
general_notes: The participant seemed to have a positive outlook on the pandemic and how it affected her life.
